title: Railworks TS2015 Virtual Railroads DB BR110 EL Orient Red
description:
DB BR110 ExpertLine Orient Red

The package includes six different versions of the German Einheitslok 
BR110 in orient red liverie.

The BR110 is the Einheitslok for passenger services.

The included locomotive has a lot of functions installed and it is not
recommended to be used by novice Train Simulator players without
any experience in the game. For other players it is very important to
have look into the manual to understand how to operate the machine!!

 Please use the ability to download the manual from this website to have a
first look at the functions and requirements and spend a certain amount 
of time learning how to operate the locomotive.

The following functions are integrated in the BR110:

Prototypically driving behaviour
Tap-changer automatic notching control N28h with characteristic sound
Manually /automatically Startup
Monitoring function for important values
like Voltage, traction temperature, 
Manually selection of the pantograph
Delayed and smooth regulated E-Break
Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Hohe AbbremsungÃ¢â‚¬Å“ for the breaks
Brake system wit overcharing air pipe pressure
Real sounds optimized for EFX
Exemplary Indusi i60
Zeit-Zeit-Sifa
Switchable instrument lights
Reading lamp and cab light
Seperatly switchable wipers with speed control
Standard TS2015 Effects
TS2015 Camera positions
Automatically KI wipers with weather detection
Light bulp adjustment for player and KI
Configuration file
In editor visible pantograph configuration
In game switchable messages language (DE/EN)

The following vehicles are included in this ExpertLine package:

DB BR110 127
DB BR110 236
DB BR110 276
3 x DB BR110 dynamic number
Quick Drive links are included
